properties.name: spring.cloud.polaris.contract.enabled
properties.description: Enable polaris record contract or not.

properties.name: spring.cloud.polaris.contract.basePackage
properties.description: Packages to be scanned. Split by ",".

properties.name: spring.cloud.polaris.contract.excludePath
properties.description: Paths to be excluded. Split by ",".

properties.name: spring.cloud.polaris.contract.basePath
properties.description: Base paths to be scanned. Split by ",".

properties.name: spring.cloud.polaris.contract.exposure
properties.description: Enable polaris contract exposure or not.

properties.name: spring.cloud.polaris.contract.report.enabled
properties.description: Enable polaris contract report or not.
